data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module implements only a genetic algorithm, contrary to the
    Algorithm::Evolutionary module which genetic algorithms are only a
    subset of. I discussed this choice of name space a few months ago on
    the perl-ai mailing list, but the author of Algorithm::Evolutionary
    had it in mind for his module back then. He finally settled on
    Algorithm::Evolutionary, so I am free to grab this one.

    It is in pure Perl, and is very easy to use and extend. The reason
    I chose AI::Genetic::Algorithm instead of AI::Genetic is because I'm
    working on a genetic programming module which I intend to package as
    AI::Genetic::Programming.
